summary: Provides a comprehensive Python interface for configuring, running, and post‑processing MODFLOW‑6 groundwater flow and transport simulations, supporting multiple coupled models, exchange definitions, time discretization, data I/O, model partitioning, and regridding within the iMOD framework.
business_intent: Enable water resources and environmental engineers to efficiently set up, execute, and analyze complex groundwater simulations using MODFLOW‑6, reducing manual effort and ensuring reproducible, scalable model workflows.
